page.title: 20LIFE AT HOME IN CAYTON
page.content: At home I love to read and my hobbies are model making and stamp collecting. I like animals and we have a Cairn terrier, a green budgerigar and a rabbit. During school holidays I go with my friend to my uncle's farm and then I wish I had a sister or brother. My parents have bought me lots of things but the ones I like best are my electric organ and my guitar. I'd like to be a musician when I grow up, so that I can entertain people. For entertainment we go into Scarborough, to the cinema or theatre. I like watching the television and wonder what life was like without it. Living in 1985 is good because of all the modern things we have and all the exciting things we can do, but I wish people cared more about each other and didn't go around planting bombs to hurt people.
